text: Marshall Belford Allen (born May 25, 1924) is an American free jazz and avant- garde jazz alto saxophone player. He also performs on flute, oboe, piccolo, and EVI (an electronic valve instrument made by Steiner, Crumar company). Allen is best known for his work with Sun Ra. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:American saxophonists Category:American jazz musicians Category:Musicians from Louisville, Kentucky
title: Marshall Allen
